titles.title: A bill to provide for the duty-free entry of certain structures and parts for use in the W. M. Keck Observatory Project, Mauna Kea, Hawaii.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/3/1987--Introduced. Provides for the duty-free entry of certain articles for use by a named organization in the construction of an optical telescope in Hawaii.
